Visibility: 3.2 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
